data.title: Tull Family
data.text:
Third Generation

4. Simon I Seigneur3 Montfort {[SEIGNEUR DE]} (Amauri (Amaury) De2, William De1 Hainault) was born in MONTFORT, France, Eure, France about 1025. Simon died 1087 at 62 years of age.

He married twice. He married Isabel Bardoul in of, France, about 1055. Isabel and Simon I Seigneur Montfort [SEIGNEUR DE] were sealed August 31, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown. He married Agnes D' D'Evreux before 1060. Agnes was born in normandy, France, France, France about 1030. Agnes was the daughter of Richard Count Of Evreux_(Everaux) and Adele Mrs De Toni_[countess_o. Agnes was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints May 13, 1933. Temple Code: temple code unknown. She was endowed March 8, 1934. Temple Code: temple code unknown. Agnes and Simon I Seigneur Montfort [SEIGNEUR DE] were sealed December 5, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown.

Simon was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints April 19, 1933. Temple Code: temple code unknown. He was endowed April 28, 1933. Temple Code: SG. Simon and Isabel Bardoul were sealed August 31, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown. Simon and Agnes D' D'Evreux were sealed December 5, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown. Line 1875 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: NAME Simon I Seigneur De /MONTFORT/ Line 1887 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: NAME Simon I Seigneur De /MONTFORT/ Line 1839 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: NAME Simon I Seigneur De /MONTFORT/

Simon I Seigneur Montfort [SEIGNEUR DE] and Agnes D' D'Evreux had the following children:

6 i. Bertrade De4 Montfort {[QUEEN OF FRANCE} was born in MONTFORT, France, Eure, France about 1059. Bertrade died February 14, 1117 in Fontrevault, Maine-Et-Loire, France, at 57 years of age. She married twice. She married Foulques Iv, Count Anjou in France, about 1080. Foulques was born in Of Anjou, France, Anjou, France 1033/1043. Foulques died April 14, 1109 in Anjou, France, Anjou, France, at 74 years of age. Foulques was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Temple Code: PROVO. He was endowed. Temple Code: PROVO. He was sealed to his parents December 2, 1972. Temple Code: PROVO. Foulques and Bertrade De Montfort [QUEEN OF FRANCE were sealed January 17, 1992. Temple Code: PROVO. (See Foulques Iv, Count Anjou for the continuation of this line.) She married Philippe I King France in Ile De France, France, May 15, 1092. Philippe was born in Reims, Marne, France before May 23, 1052/1053. Philippe was the son of Henri I King France and Anna Agnesa Yaroslavna Kiev [QUEEN OF FRANCE. Philippe died July 29, 1108 in Melun, Seine-et-Marne, France, at 55 years of age. His body was interred in St-Benoit-sur-Lo, St-Benoit-sur-Lo, Loiret, France. He was endowed January 19, 1936. Temple Code: temple code unknown. Philippe was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints September 23, 1936. Temple Code: temple code unknown.

Bertrade was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints September 5, 1916. Temple Code: temple code unknown. She was endowed August 2, 1922. Temple Code: LG. She was sealed to her parents December 21, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown. Bertrade and Foulques Iv, Count Anjou were sealed January 17, 1992. Temple Code: PROVO. 7 ii. Richard De Montfort was born in of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France about 1066. Richard died about 1092 in Sp. His body was interred in Epernon, France.

8 iii. Simon De Montfort was born in of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France about 1068. Simon died in Sp.

+ 9 iv. Amaury De Montfort was born about 1070.

10 v. Guillaume De Montfort [Bishop of Paris was born in of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France about 1073. Guillaume died August 27, 1101 at 28 years of age.
